description:
As Ryo deals with the Naruto Strait, Seiji and Nasté travel to the tallest peak in Hokkaido to find Shu. But when Anubis, the Warlord of Darkness strikes, Seiji must listen to the words of the Troopers` mysterious benefactor to learn the Lightning Strike.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 開眼! 必殺の雷光斬
